channel.title: Weirdest Virus!
channel.description:
Alright, I came back from the beach, I then plug in my printer to print some Piano tabs. My printer starts print a piece of paper saying
Hi all, If you can get into the safe mode options by rebooting and hitting either F5 or F8 (i'm not certain which so i always hit them both one at a time over and over unti it comes up :-)" this may help
(I skipped a part that is not needed to be seen (system restore))
hi, this is indeed a virus. to get rid of it, you will need to install and update an anti-virus i think this will not be possible in your case since the computer is not allowing you to do anything. so, try to enter the safe mode. to do this, press F8....
There is more but i don't feel like typing. I researched the exact quote on Google, and people seem to have no access. But me, I have full access, and nothing is blocked yet. Any tips?

STOP WATCHIN TEH PRONZ BOI

item.title: Weirdest Virus!
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Hit start menu and then hit Run, type in msconfig, and then go to start up, un-select all programs you don’t know or even all of them. Then reboot normally and run the scanner. If it’s a hijacker this is really one of the only ways to get rid of it.

Read full topic

[/quote]

Smart.[/quote]

WOW THANKS MAN

item.title: Weirdest Virus!
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Just because I had to do this with the new computer I got. Well, used, but new to me, is download a distro of Linux, from another computer, and boot up your computer onto it. Connect it to the internet from there, and get a virus scanner for your distro. The comp I have, had viruses that blocked all admin stuff, blocked scans, blocked registry editors, etc. Booting up onto linux and scanning from there, did good, and cleaned the viruses from there.

Read full topic
